phiflow_path = os.path.abspath('')
if phiflow_path.endswith('tests'):
    phiflow_path = os.path.dirname(phiflow_path)
demos_path = os.path.join(phiflow_path, 'demos')
if demos_path not in sys.path:
    sys.path.append(demos_path)
